Package com.egehurturk.handlers

Interface ResponseType

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileResponse, HTMLRenderer, JsonResponse
public interface ResponseType
Interface for response types. Example response types may be a file response type, which returns a file as a response FileResponse, or a JSON response type which returns JSON data, JsonResponse, or even an HTML renderer and returns dynamic HTML templates, HTMLRenderer

Every response type (e.g. file, json, html) should convert their results to HttpResponse to send this response to client. Response types are called in a class that is a handler, i.e. implements Handler.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    HttpResponse toHttpResponse()

    • toHttpResponse
